thought: To craft an item of type: bread, I need to craft an item of type: wheat. To do so, I need to place a hay_block in the crafting grid. The only hay_block is in slot 13, so I will move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: Now that I have crafted the wheat, I need to move it to an inventory slot (eg., 11).

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
